SCRIPT.MSCRI:
@echo off
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DIMENSIONS.PRV.INCLUDE.LWS_LOGGING_PARAMS :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_DIMENSIONS.PRV.JOBI.CONNECTION@WINDOWS :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
! DMCLI List Projects echo === begin output === &UC4RB_DMC_CMD# LWS echo === end output === set returncode=%errorlevel% IF NOT %RETURNCODE% == 0 exit /b %returncode%
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS

POST_SCRIPT.OSCRI:
:SET &variableName# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_DIMENSIONS.PRV.VARA.TEMP.LIST_PROJECTS_&$ACTIVATOR_RUNID#" :SET &variablePath# = "" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CREATE_PASS_VALUES_VARIABLE :SET &process_flag# = 0 : SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",,"REP") : PROCESS &hnd# : SET &LINE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#) : IF &LINE# = "=== end output ===" : SET &process_flag# = 0 : ENDIF : IF &process_flag# = 1 : SET &PROD_LINE# = str_find(&line#,"Product:") : IF &PROD_LINE# <> 0 : SET &PRODUCT# = STR_CUT(&line#,10,18) : SET &PRODUCT# = STR_TRIM(&PRODUCT#) : SET &PRJSTRM# = STR_CUT(&line#,39,50) : SET &PRJSTRM# = STR_TRIM(&PRJSTRM#) : SET &KEY# = "&PRODUCT#:&PRJSTRM#" !: PUT_VAR_COL &variableName#, &KEY# ,1, "&PRODUCT#" : ENDIF : SET &STATUS_LINE# = str_find(&line#,"- Status:") : IF &STATUS_LINE# <> 0 : SET &STATUS# = STR_CUT(&line#,11,30) : SET &STATUS# = STR_TRIM(&STATUS#) : PUT_VAR_COL &variableName#, &KEY# ,1, "&STATUS#" : ENDIF : SET &OWNER_LINE# = str_find(&line#,"- Owner :") : IF &OWNER_LINE# <> 0 : SET &OWNER# = STR_CUT(&line#,11,30) : SET &OWNER# = STR_TRIM(&OWNER#) : PUT_VAR_COL &variableName#, &KEY# ,2, "&OWNER#" : ENDIF : SET &PARENT_LINE# = str_find(&line#,"- Parent:") : IF &PARENT_LINE# <> 0 : SET &PARENT# = STR_CUT(&line#,11,120) : SET &PARENT# = STR_TRIM(&PARENT#) : PUT_VAR_COL &variableName#, &KEY# ,3, "&PARENT#" : ENDIF : SET &PM_LINE# = str_find(&line#,"- Project Manager:") : IF &PM_LINE# <> 0 : SET &PM# = STR_CUT(&line#,20,30) : SET &PM# = STR_TRIM(&PM#) : PUT_VAR_COL &variableName#, &KEY# ,4, "&PM#" : ENDIF : ENDIF : IF &LINE# = "=== begin output ===" : SET &process_flag# = 1 : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS
:PSET &UC4RB_PROJECTS_LIST# = &variableName#
